website_summaries.verdict: Fun clip-ons for those who might be looking for something other than the normal, boring clip-ons from the drugstore.
pros: These stylish clip-ons are a good weight – not too heavy, not too light
Cut glare and sun pretty well on a morning commute
Won't make your own glasses fall off
Quite sturdy and don't seem to fall apart with on/off use
cons: Good product but too large for most glasses

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a BIG pair of RayBan frames for my new prescription glasses. Then I couldn't find clip-on sunglasses for them except for flip-ups. Came across these on Amazon and ordered. They come with a set of black plastic frames and plano lens. I'll give them to someone to use in a play or something. At first I was a little wary of my looking like out of "the Matrix", but now I really like them. Not polarized, but cut glare and sun pretty well on morning commute. Also, after about two months (including two weeks overseas travel to India), they still look to be in great shape! I just pop them in my shirt pocket when going indoors.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: These are clip-ons with frames already attached
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are nice and are also priced well, however, I misunderstood the purpose of them. I read the reviews, and they made it sound like the clip on part could be removed, so I bought them. I will be returning them and getting a clip on pair of sunglasses that don't come with frames attached behind them. I am hoping this brand carries the clip ons separately, because they seem well made and the customer service is good so far. So for those who were wondering, these are not meant to be removed from the frames. They are more of a vintage fashion look. Apparently clip ons were a trend at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymar

customer_reviews.title: I loved these clipons
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect in size and shape. I needed round clipons, which are impossible to find in stores. These are perfect. The clips fit well and are sturdy. The spring slides nicely to release the clipons. The tint is a little dark, for my eyes, but I’m still very happy with these. Now my prescription glasses can be used for reading books by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses fit perfectly on my glasses
customer_reviews.text: I gave the fake glasses to my roommate and she likes that they make her look smart. The clip-on sunglasses are really cute on my glasses in the summer and fit perfectly. I like that they come with a little carrying pouch that I can throw the clip-ons in when I'm not wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 Stars . . .
customer_reviews.text: . . . except the lenses are not polarized, which is at least half the reason I wear sunglasses at all. Without polarization, I'm always looking through a reflection of the top of my dashboard in the windshield - with it, that's gone and everything is much sharper and clearer. My bad, though - the description clearly said "non-polarized." I just missed it. Great quality clip-ons and perfect in every other respect, though.
customer_reviews.author: bobheald

customer_reviews.title: Great slide on sunglasses with regular pair of glasses provided!
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses are great but the packaging is very strange! The sunglasses come on a FG I'll sized frame pair of glasses!! I suppose if you just really wanted to wear these but didn't need prescription glasses you could use this pair. Pretty generous but I feel unnecessary. Look good on! Easy to put on! Keeps sun out well!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Beliveau

customer_reviews.title: Glasses and clip on shades
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the clip part exclusively to clip in to my prescription glasses. Was surprised to see that an actual pair if glasses came with it. My daughter enjoys that part so she can “look like me”. They are sturdy and fit my eyeglasses nicely. Good shades in a pinch until I get prescription sunglasses after this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Lense not clear
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses come clipped to a pair of clear plastic glasses. They come off of the glasses easily and fit nicely over my prescription glasses. However, the lenses are not polarized and have an inconsistency in the shading that makes a wavy view. Makes me dizzy to wear them. Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: impressively good
customer_reviews.text: i bought this clip on sunglasses for my half-rimmed glasses and it fit almost perfectly straight out of the box, of course some tweaking had to be made in order to fit better. while it is not polarized it work just fine for my daily drives. the only problem i have is that the little bag to store it is just no suitable for keep it safe in your pocket, and the full rimmed clear glasses which came with it is just something that i didn't need nor wanted, but this is the best deal i was able to find for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente

customer_reviews.title: THESE FIT ALL OF MY  EYEGLASS FRAIMS
customer_reviews.text: As you probably have discovered, it can be expensive to get prescription lenses for sunglasses. Then any time the prescription changes, the sunglass prescription needs to change. I LOVE to collect glasses. These clip-ons can be adjusted to fit all of them! They look GREAT on all of them too. Very stylish. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Non polarized, thank goodness
customer_reviews.text: I needed a non polarized clip on’s For my car. Every clip on I found in the drug store was polarized. With polarized sun glasses, my heads-up display disappeared and many other things are unviewable. These are a bit too large for my glasses but still work.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Louderback

customer_reviews.title: but nothing too bad. They're cute and now I don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use the clip-on sunglasses over my own prescription glasses. They're a little heavy and tens to drag my glasses down, but nothing too bad. They're cute and now I don't have to struggle with switching my glasses one handed if my hands are full :)
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for My Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I didn't wanna have to buy prescription sunglasses and these are great! Check the measurements for sure. I'd they fit your glasses they're great. :)
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 chance the clip-ons will be defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of clip ons and loved them. They fit perfectly over my glasses. I decided to buy extra pairs to have as backups but unfortunately they came out defective. The spring located on the bridge is defective which makes it difficult to clip onto the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Celina washburn

customer_reviews.title: Superior sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to adjust. These clip-ons will fit your lifestyle with the sleek design, dressed up or dressed down. Superior sun protection with non-glare vision you would expect in a higher priced brand. My hubby really enjoys them and can even place them on his glasses with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Greenbanker53

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shades:)
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions are almost exact. The quality exceeds the price. I am so happy these worked out instead of having to buy prescription sunglasses. I have gotten multiple compliments on them and tell everyone where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT! I’m so happy I can finally wear my glasses while driving and not have the sun in my eyes or have to buy expensive prescription sunglasses. I’m in love with these attachments. They fit my glasses almost like they were custom made for them. The other reviews say they are too heavy and I disagree. They add a tiny bit of weight but nothing noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love these for my prescription glasses
customer_reviews.text: They were a few millimeters too big but I was able to bend the metal clasp slightly and they now fit my warby Packers perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Somebody is enjoying them
customer_reviews.text: Would love to review this item had I actually gotten it. It was delivered to someone else. Hope they write a good review. 🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: DMKCMagic

customer_reviews.title: bad dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The pieces seemed to be well made but were useless to me since the actual dimensions were at least a quarter-inch away from the advertised dimensions. I will loose so much in the return shipping I will pass them on to the Salvation Army.
customer_reviews.author: T Spooner

customer_reviews.title: My eyes are now sheltered and swanky with these shades!
customer_reviews.text: I love these clip-on sunglasses, I got them for my own frames and they fit just well enough so I’m not blinded by the Californian sun on a daily basis. And the price is super reasonable! I also get so many compliments on them. Not sure why they come with frames with clear lenses, when I only wanted the clip-ons, as if someone would wear fake glasses to wear the clip ons? But, I stashed the fakes, and they work perfectly for my circle wire frames. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Ryan

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic..really like these alot. When I'm not wearing I put back in the case..I want these to last, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Davis

customer_reviews.title: Close, but no cigar.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit my prescription glasses. My kid really likes the game glasses they came with, though.
customer_reviews.author: Thecla

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: really great sunglasses at a VERY low price point. I was sure these would be of fairly low quality at the price. But I'm pleased to report I was completely wrong. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: They do NOT fit our eyeglasses and when I slide them on, they FALL IFF. These are not CLIP ON, these are terrible !
customer_reviews.author: Angelalanders1

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied and Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fits well, Very Happy with the purchase and will purchase again in diff color!
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I measured my glasses and this size shoul have fit but was way to big.
customer_reviews.author: MeM

customer_reviews.title: Round metal glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, but don’t work well for round metal frame glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: The clip on part clips well to the Amherst frame
customer_reviews.text: These fit pretty darn well with the Amherst (similar to tart arnel) frame from classic specs. I've tried a few different clip-ons to get the right fit and these are the closest I've found. I got these for driving but I'm getting compliments on the style as well. Surprisingly decent!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lux

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find any decent clip-ons for my Rx lenses, as the shape is hard to match, but these did the trick! The only thing that’s kind of tough is that they’re a bit heavy, and cause my glasses to slide down my nose a little. If it wasn’t for that, I’d give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Really like these clip-ons but when your looking through them it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like these clip-ons but when your looking through them it's as though a sticker had been on each lens on the inside and I can't get it removed and it's like looking through scratched lens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool shades man.
customer_reviews.text: These.are my third pair and I love them. Only reason ive bought them 3 tomes is not because of product deficiencies but rather because they have been stolen twice. An awesome product and if i didn't have to wear prescription glasses. Their online store is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: fit my round lenses well
customer_reviews.text: great for round lenses. These do not flip up, but still a good fit and well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T

customer_reviews.title: Great for prescription eyeglass wearer's, looks good for a super affordable price 😎
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my prescription glasses, much easier than switching from a pair of prescription sunglasses to regular glasses and back whenever I go outside. My only wish is that they were polarized, but for the price it's not that big a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Evans

customer_reviews.title: Honestly pretty great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel great. Don't feel cheap at all. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: A Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for the sunglasses clip-on and they fit great! They don't fit my exact lens size but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for the sunglasses clip-on and they fit great! They don't fit my exact lens size but its close to within about 3mm (too large) and they still fit quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for W P Durand frames
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Warby Parker Durand frames. Excellent $$$ value. A soft case and semi hard case is included which makes packaging them in backpack, briefcase, etc easy. I liked them so much I bought two additional pair to keep in car and backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Geraghty, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice well built clipons
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use the clipon part. Very well built and look nice. The glasses part are well made and ok but I use the clipons on my Rx glasses. Excellant product.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Trump

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are nice clip on sunglasses. Unfortunately they were a little big for my prescription glasses. I would still recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Monica D.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to fit over my glasses but they ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to fit over my glasses but they didn’t fit. They are just a heap plastic clip-on. Only fits thicker plastic frames.
customer_reviews.author: Jake F

customer_reviews.title: Great product with some minor adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this product 5 stars because I really do think it's great. It's true that they are a little heavy and I had to make a few adjustments with pliers to get them just how I wanted them but they feel sturdy and look good. I have a pair of Warby Parker frames (Percel) that are somewhat round and they matched them pretty well. The only change I would like to see is if they could in fact be a little lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: They are funky but I love them! The packaging was awesome and the accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Sublime

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality. Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: These clip ons fit my prescription glasses perfectly... and look fantastic. The tortoise shell frames they came with look good but are unnecessary. I looked at other clip ons that were three to five times the cost and can’t imagine they would be any better.
customer_reviews.author: david Williger

customer_reviews.title: They didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I returned them because they didn't fit my glasses. I was very surprised that the clip-ons that I bought actually came w/ a pair of fake tortoise-shell glasses! What a waste of materials!
customer_reviews.author: mkb

customer_reviews.title: OK But Not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses are fine but for my glasses, the hooks on top and bottom are not positioned as well as I would have liked and the adjustable spring on the bridge pulls the lens together too tightly, causing gaps on either side.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Hengehold

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Good. Would be better if the material was hard and stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Azza Mahgoub

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on Warby Parkers
customer_reviews.text: They fit almost perfectly on my Warby Parker toppers. Come on and off easy and don't make my glasses fall off or anything.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: stylish
customer_reviews.text: OMG. I can't say enough about these clip on's. They are stylish lightweight and yes I am so happy. Can we say, superstar?
customer_reviews.author: J. Neblett

customer_reviews.title: The clip ons are quite sturdy and so won't fall apart with on/off use
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was only getting the clip on shades, however it came with clear glasses. I have to say these are both really well made. The clip ons are quite sturdy and so won't fall apart with on/off use. I would buy these again

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for me to find it but it's exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrell L. Russell

customer_reviews.title: The spring mechanism allows you to attach to wider glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I'm super impressed. Package arrived within a week! (I live in south africa) And it was exactly what I wanted and what it said it would be. The clip on sunglasses are pretty cool and I get the best compliments

customer_reviews.title: These are very cute, however they don't work on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, however they don't work on my glasses and they would be difficult to put on any glasses if you were driving and suddenly needed shades.
customer_reviews.author: JoTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Cannot do better than this for vintage frames n lenses.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. They fit an odd sized vintage lens just beautifully and have nice, plastic sleeves on the hooks so that the frame doesn't get all scratched up. And if the price is not reasonable enough, they include frames so you can use them as their own sunglasses if you are lucky enough to have that kind of vision! This might well be the best deal I have found in the last two years on Amazon. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Popkin

customer_reviews.title: It took me forever to find good clip-ons that fit
customer_reviews.text: Carefully measure your glasses. It took me forever to find good clip-ons that fit. Now that I have, I bought 2.

customer_reviews.title: They fit fine.
customer_reviews.text: they fit almost perfect on my prescription glasses with a few minor adjustments. They will work just fine. good price and fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!

customer_reviews.text: These are good quality and I like them. Nice dark lenses. The reason they are getting 4 stars instead of 5 is that they were just too big to fit my glasses. I had to bend them a bit to make them work. I was nervous to do that because I didn't want them to break, but it worked fine and now they fit well enough. Just the problem with buying something like this online. You can't really check to see if they fit your glasses very well.

product_meta.title: Fashion Vintage Clip On Lens Retro Sunglasses
feature_bullets: 🎯BRAND - WearMe Pro is a family-owned eyewear brand founded in the United States. WearMe Pro is passionate about providing affordable eyewear but also about helping local charities. Thanks to the ongoing support of our customers, each year we donate thousands of glasses to children in need.
😎UV PROTECTION - Our lenses provide 100% Protection Against Harmful UVA/UVB Ray. Protect your eyes in style!
👓MATERIAL - Sturdy polycarbonate frame, polycarbonate 100% UVB + UVA protection lenses, solid metal hinges, exquisite temples, all these details ensure long lasting wear and comfort!
